abstract: Between Facebook, the world’s biggest social networking Web site, and Google, the world’s biggest search engine, peaceful co-existence might never have been a problem. But the rivalry that has emerged is as much about philosophies as it is about products.
snippet: Between Facebook, the world’s biggest social networking Web site, and Google, the world’s biggest search engine, peaceful co-existence might never have been a problem. But the rivalry that has emerged is as much about philosophies as it is about p...
lead_paragraph: Corporate rivalries often turn on little differences.  Take Coca Cola and Pepsi‘s decades-long battle — whose product is really the real thing?

headline.main: Facebook vs. Google: A Showdown of Paradigms
